questionTitle: ______ offering provides the tools and development environment to deploy applications on another vendor’s application.
questionExplanation: PaaS tool is a fully integrated development environment.

questionOption1: Platforms cannot be based on specific types of development languages, application frameworks, or other constructs
questionOption2: PaaS systems offer a way to create user interfaces
questionOption3: In a CaaS model, customers may interact with the software to enter and retrieve data
questionExplanation: PaaS systems support standards such as HTML, JavaScript, or other rich media technologies.

questionTitle: Which of the following is associated with considerable vendor lock-in?
questionExplanation: The difficulty with PaaS is that it locks the developer (and the customer) into a solution that is dependent upon the platform vendor.

questionTitle: _________ serves as a PaaS vendor within Google App Engine system.
questionExplanation: Google offers many of its Web service applications to customers as part of this service model.

questionOption1: The customer takes no responsibility for maintaining the hardware, the software, or the development of the applications
questionOption2: The vendor is responsible for all the operational aspects of the service
questionOption3: Google’s App Engine platform is IaaS offering
questionExplanation: The customer is responsible only for his interaction with the platform.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be considered PaaS offering?
questionExplanation: The vendor of the PaaS solution is in most cases the developer, who is offering a complete solution to the customer.

questionTitle: __________ is the most refined and restrictive service model.
questionExplanation: When the service requires the client to use a complete hardware/software/application stack, it is using the most refined and restrictive service model.

questionTitle: _______ provides virtual machines, virtual storage, virtual infrastructure, and other hardware assets.
questionExplanation: The IaaS service provider manages all the infrastructure, while the client is responsible for all other aspects of the deployment.

questionTitle: Amazon Web Services offers a classic Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) approach to ______________
questionExplanation: In AWS, the CCS is the AWS Management Console.

questionTitle: Rackspace Cloud Service is an example of _____________
questionExplanation: Unlike other cloud providers, Rackspace only offers managed solutions.
